title: Classification
context: ยง198D-4 Classification. The department shall classify each trail and access in the inventories according to the following: (1) Function; (2) Type; (3) Theme; (4) Actual and desired use intensity; and (5) Any other classification deemed necessary or desirable by the department. [L 1988, c 236, pt of ยง2; am L 1990, c 53, ยง1(2)]
